response.overview: Love can strike everywhere. Even if, like the newly escaped Louie, you hide in a policeman's closet with a guy you do not know - a guy who broke into that real policeman's house. Louie is still in her orange jail suit, but kicked out her patches to be able to run faster. Louie likes toes, and Francois has ten of them, and lots of cute ones on top. Francois never did anything impulsive until he opened the front door and stared into Louie's slightly crazy, slightly scary, slightly sexy eyes. Now he sits barefoot in a closet and tries hard to curl his toes away from hers, while hair creeps closer to his. And soon the closet owner - a man who even showers with his gun - realizes he's not home alone.
response.title: Twintig tone in 'n hangkas
